detectors.description: LoanContract.makeExpired() () has external calls inside a loop: currentLender.send(lenderAccounts[currentLender].amountLent) ()
detectors.markdown: [LoanContract.makeExpired()]() has external calls inside a loop: [currentLender.send(lenderAccounts[currentLender].amountLent)]()

detectors.description:
LoanContract.makeExpired() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now >= fundRaisingDeadline && currentState != State.expired ()
detectors.markdown:
[LoanContract.makeExpired()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now >= fundRaisingDeadline && currentState != State.expired]()

detectors.description:
LoanContract.isDelinquent() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (now >= repaymentDeadline && currentState != State.repaid) ()
detectors.markdown:
[LoanContract.isDelinquent()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [(now >= repaymentDeadline && currentState != State.repaid)]()

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected THROW ():

detectors.markdown:

detectors.description: solc-0.4.8 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.8 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LoanContract.repay() ():
	External calls:
	- currentLender.send(amountForLender) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- checkLoanRepaid() ()
		- currentState = State.repaid ()
	- lenderAccounts[currentLender].amountRepaid += amountForLender ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LoanRepaid() ()
		- checkLoanRepaid() ()
	- RepaidToLender(currentLender,amountForLender) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LoanContract.repay()]():
	External calls:
	- [currentLender.send(amountForLender)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [checkLoanRepaid()]()
		- [currentState = State.repaid]()
	- [lenderAccounts[currentLender].amountRepaid += amountForLender]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [LoanRepaid()]()
		- [checkLoanRepaid()]()
	- [RepaidToLender(currentLender,amountForLender)]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LoanContract.checkLoanFunded() ():
	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentState = State.repaying ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DisbursedToBorrower(borrowerAddress,amountRaised) ()
